actions.name: Flash Fire

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a Fire-Type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a Fire-Type attack.
Effect: Connection - Stoke. The user takes no damage from the triggering attack and is not affected by the triggering attack's effect. Then, the user freely uses Stoke.

system.description:
